statements: DELETE FROM NetworkingContacts WHERE contact_id = 100 AND contact_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM NetworkingContacts WHERE last_contact_date < '2022-01-01' AND follow_up_required = true;

DELETE FROM contacts WHERE company='Tech Co' AND last_contacted_date < '2021-05-10';
DELETE FROM follow_ups WHERE outcome='Not Interested';
DELETE FROM events WHERE location = 'New York' AND event_date = '2023-10-15';
